english.segment1: I'm in love, and I know that you are too, And you trust that I will come through for you, I will live my life, With your pure, sinless heart as my guide.
english.segment2: Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh, oh oh.
english.segment3: He didn't bleed forever, And death couldn't hold him down. He brought us back together, And we will share his crown.
english.segment4: When in love nothing else will do, But the touch of the one who's heart beats for you. My mind's racing to the day, When we both say I do.
english.segment5: Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh, oh oh.
english.segment6: He didn't bleed forever, And death couldn't hold him down. He brought us back together, And we will share his crown.
english.segment7: Make yourself known in all your glory. And steal our breath. Our eyes now open to the story, We've been made to live, we've been made to live.
english.segment8: Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh oh, oh oh oh, oh, Oh oh, oh oh.
english.segment9: He didn't bleed forever, And death couldn't hold him down. He brought us back together, And we will share his crown.
